text: the lawyer for the neighbourhood watch captain charged with killing trayvon martin in february has waived his right to a quick trial while he prepares his defence . attorney mark o'mara , who is representing george zimmerman , filed the motion in a florida court today , saying that he needs more time to ready his case . zimmerman was charged with second-degree murder in the shooting death of martin , 17 , a miami teen who was returning from a store when he was shot by zimmerman in sanford , florida . awaiting trial : george zimmerman has been charged with second-degree murder in the
